a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Projections of the world population until 2100 by the Wittgenstein Centre
Shown is the SSP2 scenario which is the 'most likely scenario' of the various scenarios WC-IIASA produced. It is
based on the medium fertility and medium mortality projections combined with the continuation of educational
Source: Medium SSP2 - Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital
